description.en: Bitget Token (BGB) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Bitget Token has a current supply of 919,992,035.97879069 with 699,181,356.79066337 in circulation. The last known price of Bitget Token is 3.59169889 USD and is up 0.90 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 43 active market(s) with $75,614,126.59 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://www.bitget.com/.
